source_objects.title: Beauty & Makeup
source_objects.description: From hair styles to makeup tips, fashion tips to ageless secrets, welcome to the ultimate place for beauty & makeup courses.

visible_instructors.job_title: Oh SO Hairstylist - Hints, tips & tricks

items.headline: Take good advice. And create your own upstyles!
objectives_summary: Easy to follow along with skills and techniques! Taking out the guess work and saves time finding the right course for you
Importance of Prep & Set hair for upstyles
Quick and easy braids

items.headline: Learn how to braid the hair step by step
objectives_summary: Learn how to create different Braids

Fishtail braids

items.title: Nail Art Course - One Stroke Technique
items.headline: You can make beautiful nails with ornamental patterns inspired by nature, with cherry blossoms, roses or colored petals
objectives_summary: You will have the opportunity to learn how to make beautiful nail designs, such as lilies, bow, orchids, poppies, roses, butterfly but also other beautiful nail designs with one stroke technique.

items.headline: The World of Modeling Online Self-Paced Class
objectives_summary: Demonstrate basic fashion modeling techniques and have a better understanding of how to compete in the modeling industry.

items.title: Learn to Perform Long Lasting Retwists on Locs/Dreadlocks
items.headline: Retwisting Afro Locs Effectively
objectives_summary: How to neatly and effectively retwist a clients locs for long lasting results.
The products to use and how to select future products for a healthy and effective retwist.
What not to do in a retwist maintenance session and why.

items.title: Learn to make natural lipstick
items.headline: Step-by-step course in making your own lipstick
objectives_summary: Harmful chemicals in commercial lipstick
Process of making lipstick
Equipment and ingredients needed for making lipstick

items.title: Elevate your Updo
items.headline: Learn to Braid and Twist your Hair
objectives_summary: By the time you finish this course, you will be able to throw your hair up into a braided chignon, a half-Dutch accent braid into a twisted bun, a French tuck, or pretty much whatever else strikes your fancy. You can mimic runway looks, do your own hairstyles for special events, and help your friends get ready for their big nights.

items.title: Hair & Make Up + Bridal course.
items.headline: Hair & Make Up + Bridal
objectives_summary: Hair & Make Up Artistry Course/ Bridal Hair & Make Up

Our Hair and make-up + Bridal programme makes you an expert in understanding the basics of make-up and hair styling and also give you a significant amount of learning to specialize in Bridal Hair and Make-up.
